publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3532 John Wilson: Strathclyde Police’s Operation Fleet—That the Parliament congratulates Strathclyde Police on the success of Operation Fleet in tackling violence and antisocial behaviour throughout North Lanarkshire, for demonstrating a clear and purposeful police presence in crime hotspot areas that resulted in arrests for carrying offensive weapons, assault, shoplifting, street trading and street drinking, in particular for the discovery of a cannabis factory in Strathkelvin that is thought to exceed £250,000 in value, and for the support to vulnerable victims of crime offered by the newly formed Domestic Abuse Task Force. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn*, Alasdair Allan*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Christina McKelvie*, Brian Adam*, Jim Tolson*, Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*, Rob Gibson*, Robin Harper*
S3M-3532 Strathclyde Police’s Operation Fleet (lodged on 25 February 2009) Bill Kidd*, Elaine Smith*, Jackie Baillie*

S3M-3532 John Wilson: Strathclyde Police’s Operation Fleet—That the Parliament congratulates Strathclyde Police on the success of Operation Fleet in tackling violence and antisocial behaviour throughout North Lanarkshire, for demonstrating a clear and purposeful police presence in crime hotspot areas that resulted in arrests for carrying offensive weapons, assault, shoplifting, street trading and street drinking, in particular for the discovery of a cannabis factory in Strathkelvin that is thought to exceed £250,000 in value, and for the support to vulnerable victims of crime offered by the newly formed Domestic Abuse Task Force. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Alasdair Allan, Hugh O’Donnell, Christina McKelvie, Brian Adam, Jim Tolson, Bob Doris, Stuart McMillan, Rob Gibson, Robin Harper, Bill Kidd, Elaine Smith, Jackie Baillie, Jack McConnell*
S3M-3532 Strathclyde Police’s Operation Fleet (lodged on 25 February 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3532 Strathclyde Police’s Operation Fleet (lodged on 25 February 2009) Karen Whitefield*
S3M-3532 Strathclyde Police’s Operation Fleet (lodged on 25 February 2009) Angela Constance*
